name: kobo-instapaper-proxy-lambda
description: Lambda handler that renders pages through headless Chrome and rewrites links for a proxy.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/src && cp package.json package-lock.json dist/ && CHROMIUM_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true npm ci --omit=dev --ignore-scripts --prefix dist && npx esbuild src/handler.js --bundle --minify --platform=node --format=esm --target=node20 --outfile=dist/src/handler.js --external:@sparticuz/chromium --external:puppeteer-core
